backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing user registration, authentication, profile management, and username search, with role-based access control via a MixinAuthorization mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (signup, login, home/search screen, dark theme) to their source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file for quick reference during build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes, including background, foreground, primary, and sidebar color variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining routes for /, /login, /signup, /home, and /user/:username with localStorage-based auth guards redirecting unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Custom hook managing a username/timestamp session persisted in localStorage, exposing saveSession and clearSession helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context provider and hook wrapping DFINITY's AuthClient to manage login, logout, and identity state with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks exposing useSearchUsers (query), useRegisterUser (mutation), and useAuthenticateUser (mutation) that call the backend actor methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Inter font, sets up Tailwind directives, and defines dark-first CSS custom properties for theming (colors, sidebar, charts) plus a thin scrollbar utility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, and the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with a debounced user search input, displays search results as clickable user list items, and provides logout and navigation to user profiles.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page with username/password form that authenticates via a mutation hook, saves the session, and navigates to home on success.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Signup page with username, password, and confirm-password fields including validation, password strength indicators, and auto-login after successful registration.
frontend/src/pages/UserDetailPage.tsx: User profile detail page showing avatar, username, and a disabled 'Message (Coming Soon)' button, with special handling when viewing one's own profile.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, defining dark mode, custom color tokens using oklch CSS variables, typography, container queries, animation plugins, and custom keyframes/shadows.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file describing a WhatsApp-like messaging app, listing existing implemented features (signup, login, home/search screens, dark theme) and pending new feature requests with their requirement IDs and statuses.
